about_the_game:
In the snowy ground, a freezing baby was unexpectedly rescued by two high monks, and them him to a mountain temple.


How do they rescue the dying child from the two black and white death?


The main character (Feng) is a rescue by the two monks, and after reaching adulthood, he embarked on a long journey to find his family. During his journey, he met some trustable friends and his loved person. During her travels in the city, he suddenly encountered a madness murderer, and he decide to Be Arrested murderer.

However, When Feng and his friends searching the murderer, they find a very big secret!

hidden in the city, there is a huge terror organization that has been living in the city for a long time. And hero Feng and his friends decide to destroy them.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Main features:

・This game is a 2.5D view, and it is a Classic RPG game with rich entertainment.

・A classic RPG fight system.There is also a day and night system, which brings a different visual experience to the turn-based combat.




It has an attack range system, if out of range cannot attack enemy, but you can use a skill to fight.

・It is an classic RPG game, but it has some action zone.


predicament and jumping are a feature of game.

・In your journey, it also has some puzzle.


Push an object to open a switch, and be aware of dangers around you.

・This game has added a "sanity" system, which allows characters to increase or decrease their "sanity" in various situations.。


When "Sanity" is lower than 0, the character will enter the "dying" state. Completing certain events, or obtaining certain items, or taking a full rest will restore "Sanity"。

・There will also be all kinds of funny questions.

・There will be some funny tasks and funny dialogues, bringing happy to people, and bringing relaxation and joy to people in the tense atmosphere of solving the murder case.

・This game will have a rich plot, and it will be arranged at the right time to let people experience the original moving and beautiful story.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story features:

・In a modern city, the traditional martial arts active in modem city.

・There is a huge secret hidden behind the terrorist forces hidden in the darkness of the city.

・The hero Wind and his team friends solve puzzles and will have multiple endings.

let us wait and see.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

・I'm happy to say that my personal indie game is now available on Steam! This is the result of my hard work; I hope everyone can like and support my game.

As an independent developer, I know that my game may still have many shortcomings, but I will always work hard to improve and bring players a better gaming experience. I sincerely thank you for your support and encouragement and hope to hear your valuable opinions and suggestions. Every opinion is very important to me, so that I can constantly improve the game.

Thank you again for your support, I will continue to work hard to bring you more exciting game content!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages, or for access at work: Occasional violence or gore, common adult content

detailed_description:
In the snowy ground, a freezing baby was unexpectedly rescued by two high monks, and them him to a mountain temple.


How do they rescue the dying child from the two black and white death?


The main character (Feng) is a rescue by the two monks, and after reaching adulthood, he embarked on a long journey to find his family. During his journey, he met some trustable friends and his loved person. During her travels in the city, he suddenly encountered a madness murderer, and he decide to Be Arrested murderer.

However, When Feng and his friends searching the murderer, they find a very big secret!

hidden in the city, there is a huge terror organization that has been living in the city for a long time. And hero Feng and his friends decide to destroy them.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Main features:

・This game is a 2.5D view, and it is a Classic RPG game with rich entertainment.

・A classic RPG fight system.There is also a day and night system, which brings a different visual experience to the turn-based combat.




It has an attack range system, if out of range cannot attack enemy, but you can use a skill to fight.

・It is an classic RPG game, but it has some action zone.


predicament and jumping are a feature of game.

・In your journey, it also has some puzzle.


Push an object to open a switch, and be aware of dangers around you.

・This game has added a "sanity" system, which allows characters to increase or decrease their "sanity" in various situations.。


When "Sanity" is lower than 0, the character will enter the "dying" state. Completing certain events, or obtaining certain items, or taking a full rest will restore "Sanity"。

・There will also be all kinds of funny questions.

・There will be some funny tasks and funny dialogues, bringing happy to people, and bringing relaxation and joy to people in the tense atmosphere of solving the murder case.

・This game will have a rich plot, and it will be arranged at the right time to let people experience the original moving and beautiful story.

Story features:

・In a modern city, the traditional martial arts active in modem city.

・There is a huge secret hidden behind the terrorist forces hidden in the darkness of the city.

・The hero Wind and his team friends solve puzzles and will have multiple endings.

let us wait and see.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

・I'm happy to say that my personal indie game is now available on Steam! This is the result of my hard work; I hope everyone can like and support my game.

As an independent developer, I know that my game may still have many shortcomings, but I will always work hard to improve and bring players a better gaming experience. I sincerely thank you for your support and encouragement and hope to hear your valuable opinions and suggestions. Every opinion is very important to me, so that I can constantly improve the game.

Thank you again for your support, I will continue to work hard to bring you more exciting game content!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is the story of an abandoned baby who was accidentally rescued by two eminent monks. After he grows up, he goes down the mountain to travel the world. This game has multiple endings.
